headline.main: NAZIS SAID TO BID FOR SOVIET PEACE; Washington Foreign Circles Hear Stalin Has Not Yet Rejected Offer by Hitler

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct 2 -- Reports received in some foreign diplomatic circles from Moscow today were to the effect that Reichsfuehrer Hitler had made what was described as a liberal peace offer to Premier Stalin and that it had not yet been definitely rejected.
abstract: Denies truth of Moscow peace rumors
